DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability cariprazine treatment outpatient bipolar depression .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy RGH-188 ( Cariprazine ) Bipolar Depression
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 1865 year old Currently meet DSMIVTR criterion Bipolar I II Disorder without psychotic feature , current depressive episode A verify previous manic , hypomanic , mixed episode Score 20 high HAMD17 Score 2 high Item 1 HAMD Score great 12 Young Mania Rating Scale Eight episode mood disturbance ( depression , mania , hypomania , mixed state ) within 12 month prior Visit 1 Principal DSMIVTRbased diagnosis axis I disorder bipolar disorder ( secondary diagnosis comorbid Generalized Anxiety Disorder , Social Anxiety Disorder , specific phobia acceptable )
